item.description: Description FREEPLAY returns to the ALE HOUSE for its first show in 2012!!! We are gearing up and getting ready to play after a couple of weeks off, on what is sure to be a great night. The Ale House has awesome food and drink specials and TV's everywhere you look to keep an eye on the NFL Playoffs - along with a large dance floor, pool tables, and the great looking wait staff !!!... we're also celebrating some special birthdays (DLR) so this is sure to be a party you don't want to miss!!!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: FREEPLAY is BACK at the ORANGE ALE HOUSE!!!
